mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, january, february, march, april, may, june, july, august, september, october, november, december, january + february + march + april + may + june + july + august + september + october + november + december AS total FROM ( SELECT base.USER_ID, MAX( CASE DATE_FORMAT( wages.CREATEON, '%Y%m' ) WHEN CONCAT( YEAR ( SYSDATE( ) ), '01' ) THEN IFNULL(TOTAL3,0) ELSE 0 END ) january, MAX( CASE DATE_FORMAT( wages.CREATEON, '%Y%m' ) WHEN CONCAT( YEAR ( SYSDATE( ) ), '02' ) THEN IFNULL(TOTAL3,0) ELSE 0 END ) february, MAX( CASE DATE_FORMAT( wages.CREATEON, '%Y%m' ) WHEN CONCAT( YEAR ( SYSDATE( ) ), '03' ) THEN IFNULL(TOTAL3,0) ELSE 0 END ) march, MAX( CASE DATE_FORMAT( wages.CREATEON, '%Y%m' ) WHEN CONCAT( YEAR ( SYSDATE( ) ), '04' ) THEN IFNULL(TOTAL3,0) ELSE 0 END ) april, MAX( CASE DATE_FORMAT( wages.CREATEON, '%Y%m' ) WHEN CONCAT( YEAR ( SYSDATE( ) ), '05' ) THEN IFNULL(TOTAL3,0) ELSE 0 END ) may, MAX( CASE DATE_FORMAT( wages.CREATEON, '%Y%m' ) WHEN CONCAT( YEAR ( SYSDATE( ) ), '06' ) THEN IFNULL(TOTAL3,0) ELSE 0 END ) june, MAX( CASE DATE_FORMAT( wages.CREATEON, '%Y%m' ) WHEN CONCAT( YEAR ( SYSDATE( ) ), '07' ) THEN IFNULL(TOTAL3,0) ELSE 0 END ) july, MAX( CASE DATE_FORMAT( wages.CREATEON, '%Y%m' ) WHEN CONCAT( YEAR ( SYSDATE( ) ), '08' ) THEN IFNULL(TOTAL3,0) ELSE 0 END ) august, MAX( CASE DATE_FORMAT( wages.CREATEON, '%Y%m' ) WHEN CONCAT( YEAR ( SYSDATE( ) ), '09' ) THEN IFNULL(TOTAL3,0) ELSE 0 END ) september, MAX( CASE DATE_FORMAT( wages.CREATEON, '%Y%m' ) WHEN CONCAT( YEAR ( SYSDATE( ) ), '10' ) THEN IFNULL(TOTAL3,0) ELSE 0 END ) october, MAX( CASE DATE_FORMAT( wages.CREATEON, '%Y%m' ) WHEN CONCAT( YEAR ( SYSDATE( ) ), '11' ) THEN IFNULL(TOTAL3,0) ELSE 0 END ) november, MAX( CASE DATE_FORMAT( wages.CREATEON, '%Y%m' ) WHEN CONCAT( YEAR ( SYSDATE( ) ), '12' ) THEN IFNULL(TOTAL3,0) ELSE 0 END ) december FROM base LEFT JOIN wages ON base.USER_ID = wages.USER_ID AND wages.STATUS = '0' WHERE IFNULL(base.STATUS,'0') = '0' GROUP BY USER_ID ) tablewages
